trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent" /> event that is raised by visual design tools, such as Visual Studio 2005, implementing the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent" /> que é gerado por ferramentas de design visual, como o Visual Studio 2005, Implementando a interface <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView" />.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> é gerado pelo host de designer para determinadas ações em um controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is handled by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method, which takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> evento é manipulado por um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> Delegar método, que usa uma <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objeto como um parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Typically, control designer classes do not directly implement or assign a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, classes de controle de designer não diretamente implementar ou atribuir um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> base class supplies a default delegate for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> classe base fornece um delegado de padrão para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> evento.

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Designers de controle personalizado substituem o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> métodos para processar os eventos para o controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method sets the default event delegate for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> método define o delegado de evento padrão para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> delegate.
